text: I’ve been on this planet for a week now but I still haven’t gotten any clients.
My stand is immaculate. My trenchcoat is perfectly ironed.
My hat doesn’t have a single speck of dust.
Is it because I’m a new resident? It’s difficult to trust new faces.
There’s no guarantee of my credentials, perhaps if I display my business cards, I’ll seem more professional…
Now, where did I place those?
speaker: det
